title: Screen Design:  "Voodoo for Peace," Reverse Side
medium: Black and color marking pens (?), brush and watercolor/inks (?), graphite touches on white tracing paper
description: Four panel screen in form of four figures, each composed of different, colorful, decorative geometric shapes.  Reading from left to right, figure with eye-shaped head; figure with headdress of cans and feathers; figure with king's crown; figure with target head.  Each figure wears a short straw skirt over long red skirt.
name: Drawing
